Name: Unlocked
About the game: Unlocked is a short, relaxing, first person adventure game. As an interstellar being, you are tasked with vising the four seasons of earth. Collect the items that will help fix time and save the planet! Features A short, relaxing, peaceful, exploration-adventure full of enchanting detail Search for collectibles and hidden items Discover secret areas Steam Achievements to unlock! Featuring an original score by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer And then, once you have completed that mission, get yourself to Mars for a complete second adventure. Unlock the mystery at the heart of the planet. Enjoy another first person mission on the famous red planet, exploring its landscape, its deep tropical canyons, abandoned space stations and the secrets far below the surface. Features A four-level Sci-Fi exploration-adventure Search for alien collectibles and hidden items Try to discover super secret areas Steam Achievements to unlock! 3x Bonus 'Platform Space Training' levels Featuring an original score by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer
